settings.metalRequiresNewerIOS: Metal acceleration requires iOS 18 or higher. Please upgrade your device to use this feature.
settings.openCLDescription: GPU acceleration for Adreno GPUs. Faster prompt processing, but generation may not always be faster.
settings.openCLNotAvailable: OpenCL is not available on this device. Requires Adreno GPU with i8mm and dotprod CPU features.
settings.openCLMissingCPUFeatures: OpenCL requires i8mm and dotprod CPU features, which are not available on this device.
settings.openCLQuantizationNote: Note: Pure Q4_0 quantized models perform best with OpenCL.
settings.openCLDocsLink: See llama.cpp OpenCL docs for details.
settings.deviceSelectionIOSDescription: Choose Metal GPU or CPU-only mode
settings.deviceSelectionAndroidDescription: Select compute device (CPU, GPU, or Hexagon NPU)
settings.cpuOnlyNoAccelerators: CPU only - No hardware accelerators detected
settings.modelReloadNotice: Model reload needed for changes to take effect.
settings.imageMaxTokensDescription: Maximum tokens for image processing: {{tokens}}{{effectiveTokens}} (lower = faster, less detail)
settings.flashAttentionDescription: Enable Flash Attention for faster processing
settings.flashAttentionAndroidDescription: Must be disabled for OpenCL state save/load
settings.keyCacheTypeDescription: Select the cache type for key computation
settings.keyCacheTypeDisabledDescription: Enable Flash Attention to change cache type
settings.valueCacheTypeDescription: Select the cache type for value computation
settings.valueCacheTypeDisabledDescription: Enable Flash Attention to change cache type
settings.useMlockDescription: Force system to keep model in RAM rather than swapping or compressing
settings.useMmapDescription: Use memory-mapped files for faster model loading
settings.useMmapTrueDescription: Always use memory mapping for faster loading
settings.useMmapFalseDescription: Never use memory mapping (slower loading but may reduce memory usage)
settings.useMmapSmartDescription: Automatically choose based on model type (Android only)
settings.useMmapRecommended: Recommended for performance - Memory-mapped with locked pages. Combines fast loading with consistent performance
settings.autoOffloadLoadDescription: Offload model when app is in background.
settings.autoNavigateToChatDescription: Navigate to chat when loading starts.
settings.displayMemoryUsageDescription: Display memory usage in the chat page.
settings.exportLegacyChatsDescription: Use this if migration failed or you need to recover old chat sessions.
settings.importChatsDescription: Import chat sessions from an (exported) JSON file.
settings.importError: Failed to import chat sessions. Please check the file format.
settings.tokenIsSetDescription: Token is set. Required for accessing gated models.
settings.setTokenDescription: Set a token to access gated models from Hugging Face.
settings.useHfTokenDescription: Enable to use token for API requests. Disable if token is causing authentication issues.
settings.clearPalCachesDescription: Clears cached data used to speed up Shortcuts. This won't affect your Pals or chat history.
settings.clearCachesConfirmMessage: This will clear all cached session data ({{fileCount}} files, {{size}}). Shortcuts may be slower on first use after clearing. This won't affect your Pals or chat history.
settings.clearCachesError: Failed to clear caches. Please try again.

alerts.combinedWarningMessage: This model may exceed available memory and this device may not have sufficient resources for multimodal models. Loading may cause instability. Continue anyway?

labels.author: Author
labels.viewModelCardOnHuggingFace: View Model Card on Hugging Face

template.label: Template:
template.note1: Note: Changing the template may alter BOS, EOS, and system prompt.
template.note2: Uses Nunjucks. Leave empty to use model's template.

completionParams.include_thinking_in_context: Include AI thinking/reasoning parts in the context sent to the model. Disabling this can save context space. It might impact performance.
completionParams.jinja: Enable Jinja templating for chat formatting. When enabled, uses Jinja-based chat template processing for better compatibility with modern models.
completionParams.grammar: Enforce specific grammar rules to ensure the generated text follows a particular structure or format
completionParams.stop: Define specific phrases that will stop text generation
completionParams.n_predict: Set how long the generated response should be (in tokens)
completionParams.n_probs: Show probability scores for alternative words.
completionParams.top_k: Control creativity by limiting word choices to the K most likely options. Lower values make responses more focused
completionParams.top_p: Balance creativity and coherence. Higher values (near 1.0) allow more creative but potentially less focused responses
completionParams.min_p: The minimum probability for a token to be considered. Filter out unlikely words to reduce nonsensical or out-of-context responses
completionParams.temperature: Control creativity vs predictability. Higher values make responses more creative but less focused
completionParams.penalty_last_n: How far back to check for repetition. Larger values help prevent long-term repetition
completionParams.penalty_repeat: Discourage word repetition. Higher values make responses use more diverse language
completionParams.penalty_freq: Penalize overused words. Higher values encourage using a broader vocabulary
completionParams.penalty_present: Reduce repetition of themes and ideas. Higher values encourage more diverse content
completionParams.mirostat: Enable advanced control over response creativity. Set to 1 or 2 (smoother) for smart, real-time adjustments to randomness and coherence.
completionParams.mirostat_tau: Set the target creativity level for Mirostat. Higher values allow for more diverse and imaginative responses, while lower values ensure more focused outputs.
completionParams.mirostat_eta: How quickly Mirostat adjusts creativity. Higher values mean faster adjustments
completionParams.dry_multiplier: Strength of the DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) feature. Higher values strongly prevent repetition
completionParams.dry_base: Base penalty for repetition in DRY mode. Higher values are more aggressive at preventing repetition
completionParams.dry_allowed_length: How many words can repeat before DRY penalty kicks in
completionParams.dry_penalty_last_n: How far back to look for repetition in DRY mode
completionParams.dry_sequence_breakers: Symbols that reset the repetition checker in DRY mode
completionParams.ignore_eos: Continue generating even if the model wants to stop. Useful for forcing longer responses
completionParams.logit_bias: Influence how likely specific words are to appear in the response
completionParams.seed: Set the random number generator seed. Useful for reproducible results
completionParams.xtc_probability: Set the chance for token removal via XTC sampler. 0 is disabled
completionParams.xtc_threshold: Set a minimum probability threshold for tokens to be removed via XTC sampler. (> 0.5 disables XTC)
completionParams.typical_p: Enable locally typical sampling with parameter p. 1.0 is disabled

about.description: An app that brings language models directly to your phone. Sits on the shoulders of llama.cpp and llama.rn.
about.supportProjectDescription: If you enjoy using PocketPal AI, please consider supporting the project by:
